title: Assistant Quality Manager
jobDescription:
Job Description & Specification

1. Job Specification Assistant/Deputy Quality Manager
1. Qualifications and Technical Competencies Required Education

  • Mandatory: Graduate in any stream
  • Certifications: Six Sigma Green Belt preferred


Experience

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in the BPO industry, with a focus on quality assurance, process improvement, or related areas.
  • Minimum 2 years of experience as an Assistant Manager, specifically in Transactional Quality or process improvement.


Mandatory Skill Requirements Domain:

  • Effective problem-solving and decision-making skills.
  • Proficiency in Process/Quality Improvement Methodologies such as Lean, Kaizen, Six Sigma DMAIC.
  • Ability to gather and analyze data leading to useful conclusions and actionable insights.
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to communicate confidently and politely.



Technical Competencies: (Job related)

  • Proficiency in analytics, including data analysis and interpretation.
  • Good knowledge of MS Office applications, including Excel, PowerPoint, and Word.
  • Descent knowledge of statistical tools for data analysis and process improvement.


Soft Skills: (Job related)

  • Professional etiquette
  • Excellent Communication skills
  • Good interpersonal skills


Job Description:

  • Implement and manage quality assurance processes and procedures to ensure adherence to organizational standards and client requirements.
  • Develop and maintain quality metrics, dashboards, and reporting mechanisms to track performance and identify areas for improvement.
  • Conduct regular audits and evaluations of processes, transactions, and interactions to identify gaps and opportunities for enhancement.
  • Provide coaching and feedback to team members to drive continuous improvement and ensure consistent service quality.
  • Collaborate with operations, training, and support teams to develop and implement training programs and process improvements based on quality insights and analysis.
  • Investigate customer complaints and service issues, identify root causes, and implement corrective and preventive actions.
  • Lead cross-functional quality improvement projects and initiatives to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
  • Stay updated on industry best practices, trends, and regulatory requirements related to quality management and BPO operations.
  • Foster a culture of quality excellence and continuous improvement within the organization.

Client relationship:

  • Ensure that a smooth relationship is maintained between the company and the client by fostering open communication channels, addressing concerns promptly, and proactively identifying opportunities for improvement.
  • Appraise the client on the happenings at Hexaware BPS whenever necessary, providing updates on key initiatives, performance metrics, and any relevant changes that may impact the client's operations or service delivery.
  • Deliver the data requested by the client in appropriate timings, ensuring accuracy, completeness, and adherence to agreed- upon timelines.
  • Ensure governance mechanisms are in place and adherence to contractual agreements, service level agreements (SLAs), and compliance requirements


Corporate Alignment:

  • Communicate company vision, mission, and goals. Ensure complete alignment of the functional / service line teams to overall company objectives.
  • Champion Hexaware culture by role modeling behaviors
  • Create a work environment that nurtures and supports diversity and has an inclusive work culture
  • Ensure productive work relationships are established with all relevant internal functions
  • Ensure data confidentiality, integrity and protection of company's intellectual property


Compliances:

  • Adherence to company policies, rules and regulations
  • To follow quality processes thoroughly using checklist standards.
  • Responsible for complying with all QMS and ISMS Policies and procedures.





2. Purpose

The objective of this document is to provide the Job Description and specifications for all the designations in the process


3. Intended Audience

The JD has been prepared targeting the following audience.

  1. Quality Asst. Manager
  2. Quality Deputy Manager

title: Unity3D
jobDescription:
• The XR Experiences team is part of the Design and Customer Experience team in the organization and is responsible for building delightful, consistent, intuitive, and engaging immersive experiences on JioGlass for our B2C customers across Media & Entertainment, Learning, Shopping, Gaming and Productivity; and our B2B enterprise customers across Remote Assistance, Communication & Collaboration and Enterprise learning use-cases.
  • The SSE Unity3D position is an individual contributor role. You will be responsible for architecting, planning, designing, developing and testing new and unique applications for Mixed Reality shaping user experience and overall product development.
  • You will be working with an interdisciplinary team of Unity3D Developers, UI Designers, UX Designers, Unity3D Technical Artists, 3D content creators, sound production and PR involved, and fully immersed in creating initial concepts, prototyping, and development in Unity3D, launch and post-launch relationships with distributors and partners.
Your work at Tesseract will be key in shaping the user journey of millions of Mixed Reality users globally in the coming years.
A portfolio of professional projects including work with web/mobile/AR/VR applications in a must have requirement while applying for this job.
  • Designed and developed consumer grade applications/games in Unity3D.
  • Proactively communicate and collaborate with internal customers to analyze information needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: Functional/Business Requirements, High-Level Architecture, Low-Level Architecture, System Requirements, Design Documents, Wireframe, etc
  • Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs
  • Successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously
  • Drive and challenge product units on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans
  • Serves as the conduit between the product/customer community and the software development team through which requirements flow
  • Develop requirements specifications according to standard templates
  • Be the liaison between the product units, technology, support and IT development teams.
  • Agile software delivery process using JIRA (including breaking down work into modular tasks, updating/tracking task status/work log entries for sprint management), Gerrit/Git (source code management including branching strategy, code review) and Automation Tools.
Job Specification
  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Game Design, Game Development or relevant field.
  • 15+ Years of Experience in game/application development.
  • 7+ Years of Experience in Unity3D based game development
  • 5+ Years of Experience in delivering high-quality consumer applications/games built using Unity3D, preferably over mobile platforms.
  • Proven experience of managing and mentoring a team of 10+ Unity3D developers as senior or lead role.
  • Advanced C#/C++ knowledge with architecture and design patterns.
  • Solid OOPs programming skills and design patterns.
  • Strong mathematical skills, knowledge of vectors, matrices, and linear algebra.
  • Strong knowledge of Unity3D application life cycles, Editor Tools, Events, Actions, Input System, Rendering Pipeline.
  • Strong knowledge of designing state machines and multi-level games/applications in Unity3D.
  • Experience in maintaining Performance & Optimisation in Unity3D Applications.
  • Strong knowledge of Networking APIs in Unity3D.
Desired Skills
  • Experience architecting and developing editor tools for Unity3D.
  • Experience in architecting and developing high-peformant shaders and graphics libraries for Unity3D.
  • Experience in building XR applications/SDKs for Hololens, Magic Leap, Oculus, HTC Vive, etc.
  • Experience in building consumer applications for mixed reality is a huge plus.
